Name: Uncle Vanya
Ingredients: 20 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Simple but great - smooth, sweet 'n' sour blackberry, although possibly a tad on the sweet side for some.
History: Named after Anton Chekhov's greatest play - a cheery tale of envy and despair. A popular drink in Britain's TGI Friday bars, its origins are unknown.
Nutrition: One serving of Uncle Vanya contains 178 calories
